poker

Class PlayingCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.PlayingCard

  • public class PlayingCard
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a standard playing card with a suit, face value and game value. The game value is used to value the Ace as the highest card. Also has a type attribute, a String of the card type.
    Author:
    Dara Callinan, Jazheel Luna, Eoghan O'Donnell, Crischelle Pana
